homepage_subtitle: Speak with a consultant today to find the best point-of-sale for your business
helping_section_title: Helping you compare & find the best POS system
helping_section_desc: With the knowledge of our consultants who have been in the business for over 10 years, they will help you find the best point-of-sale system. Whether a big or small business, we will find the perfect match for you!
business_review_desc: Speak to our professional point-of-sale consultant about your business and your point-of-sale needs such as equipment needed, menu, features, and pricing.
schedule_a_demo_desc: We will recommend and help schedule on-site or remote demo/s with our team and the point-of-sale company
obtain_pricing_desc: Our ranking method is a combination of online reviews, popularity, feedback, pricing, and a few other factors.
final_decision_desc: Your consultant will weigh in all the features, services, and pricing to determine the best point-of-sale system for you and your business!
metric_title: What sets us apart from other companies?
home_page_client_desc: We are flexible when it comes to working with any point-of-sale company. Here's a list of our top providers in the industry.
questionnaire_title: Fill out the questionnaire and see what POS works best for your business!
questionnaire_desc: You may qualify for a Free POS if:
question_salesystem: Do you currently own a point of sale system?
question_stations: How many stations do you require?
question_handhelds: How many handhelds do you require?
question_discount_program: Are you currently on the cash discount program?
questionnaire_intro_2: You are currently on the Cash Discount Program
questionnaire_intro_3: Based on total credit card processing volume
category_desc: Your Point of Sale system is the core of your restaurant, so picking the right one is important.
free_pos_title: FREE point-of-sale & terminals of your choice available!
free_pos_desc: There are many qualified POS systems out there and BestPOS is here to help you find the perfect match!
evaluate_title: How we evaluate point of sale software
evaluate_desc: We take into consideration the most important aspects of choosing the best POS for your business
business_steps_title: With these three easy steps your business may be qualified for a FREE POS system.
business_step_1: Merchant is willing to go on the Cash Discount Program which leads to zero processing fees!
business_step_2: Qualify a review of the merchant’s most recent three month credit card processing statements
business_step_3: Merchant’s Credit Card Processing Application (must apply with our recommended processing company)
free_point_of_sale: FREE point-of-sale & terminals of your choice available!
about_us_desc:
Best POS offers a wide variety of products and services to assist our merchants, as well as industry-tailored options that few competitors can (or will) match.

To complement our services, and to make processing easier and affordable for our customers, we provide cutting-edge credit card processing equipment, terminals, POS systems and software – free of charge.
unparalleled_sevice_desc: Our team is dedicated in helping with the initial point-of-sale set up as well as being your reoccurringtech support liaison with your new point-of-sale system.
contact_title: We’d love to hear from you
contact_desc: Our friendly team is always here to chat.
email_message: Our friendly team is here to help.
office_message: Come say hello at our office HQ.
get_in_touch_message: We’d love to hear from you. Please fill out this form.
footer_form_desc: BestPOS helps businesses secure the best deals on premium POS systems. Sign up to receive deals.
thank_you_form_title: Thanks for filling out the form!
thank_you_form_desc: We will review your information and get back to you in 1-2 business days.
thank_you_form_message: If you would like to learn more, feel free to contact us at
pos_question_credit_volume: What’s your yearly credit card volume?
breadme_desc: Boost your business' revenue and incentivize cash payments.
breadme_contact_message: Learn why thousands of businesses are implementing the Cash Discount Programs
breadme_footer_title: Is the Cash Discount Program Right For Your Business?
breadme_feature_heading: Allow merchants to collect up to 100% of their revenue without any fees.
common_question_discount: Common Questions About the Cash Discount Program
common_question_discount_desc: Check out Frequently Asked Questions from other merchants just like you.

home_page.sub_title: We understand the overwhelming task of sifting through numerous Point of Sale systems available today. That's why we're on a mission to simplify things for you. Our goal is to help you select the perfect POS solution that suits your business like a glove. Check out our feedback.
